mvc.title: MVC Architecture (Model-View-Controller)
mvc.description: Clear separation of responsibilities between business logic, user interface, and data flow control, facilitating maintenance, scalability, and testability.

docker.title: Docker Infrastructure
docker.description: Isolated and replicable environment using Docker and docker-compose, ensuring consistency across development, testing, and production environments.

database.title: Database Versioning
database.description: Database structure changes managed through migrations, allowing version history, safe rollbacks, and synchronization between environments.

quality.title: Code Quality and Standards
quality.description: Use of Prettier, linting rules, and Conventional Commits to maintain consistent code style, avoid common errors, and improve collaboration.

tests.title: Automated Tests

auth.title: Authentication and Authorization
